name: THE POOR PEOPLES VOLUNTARY ORGANISATION
briefDescription: THE POOR PEOPLE`S VOLUNTARY ORGANISATION – A GLANCE	“Service to man is Service to God” is a maxim which has been in existence for ages. But people who understood its meaning in the wider sense are very few .Influenced by my parents Chevuru Venkateswarlu and Venkamma belonging to Kavali ,Nellore District, A.P., l Chevuru Chinna emerged as source to   help the deserved and need, ‘’lnner urge  ‘’drove me towards service. I founded voluntary organization in the year 2007 under the guidance of my father. Besides conducting free medical camps to the poor, financial assistance is also being provided to the poor students.
